levels.description:
Attacks hit twice, and gain 1 Coin upon defeating an enemy; when skill is manually deactivated, <@ba.vup>all</> Coins will be spent to randomly attack enemies in a frontal area. Each Coin spent in this manner hits once for <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage and knocks the target back <@ba.vup>slightly</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration, can be manually deactivated at any time; a maximum of 10 Coins may be held while this Skill is equipped</>
